mapper.select: /* springsecurity-mapper.xml selectUserView 사용자 조회 */ SELECT tb1.user_id , tb2.user_pw AS password , tb1.user_name , tb2.role_id , tb2.last_login_dtm , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS login_time , IFNULL(NULLIF(tb2.session_time, ''), 30) AS session_time , TB2.pw_err_cnt FROM tbsy_user tb1 JOIN tbsy_login tb2 ON tb1.user_id = tb2.user_id WHERE tb1.user_id = #{user_id}
